sense.def:
A match
je tekmovalno srečanje, na primer v nogometu, kriketu, šahu in drugih športih.

A match
je tudi lesena paličica, ki ima na koncu glavico iz snovi, ki se vžge, ko z njo potegnemo ob strani škatlice.

Kadar ena stvar
matches another
, je zelo podobna drugi.

seg.quote: The captain's feelings clearly matched my own.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
matches one thing with another
ali kadar
matches them up
, sklene, da je ena primerna za drugo ali da med njima obstaja povezava.

seg.quote: All you have to do is correctly match the famous personalities with the towns they come from.

sense.def:
To match something
pomeni biti nečemu enak po hitrosti, velikosti ali kakovosti.

seg.quote: They are trying to upgrade their cars to match the foreign competition.
She walked at a pace that Morris's short legs could hardly match.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
is no match for another thing
, je slabše od neke druge stvari.

seg.quote: A machine gun is no match for a tank.
